<title level="1" right="Rules">[Affixing a Talisman](/Rules.aspx?ID=726)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 565 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Each talisman’s stat block indicates the type of item it can be affixed to. Affixing or removing requires using the [Affix a Talisman](/Actions.aspx?ID=520) activity. A single talisman can be affixed to only one item at a time, and an item can have only one talisman affixed to it at a time.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Affixing a Talisman
